document_data.name: What Came Out of My Mouth Too Swiftly
document_data.author: [[Jeremmer Hardree]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''What Came Out of My Mouth Too Swiftly''''' was a collection of the jests of [[Jeremmer Hardree]], the Mad Jester, a court fool to two kings and a queen of the city-state of [[Ormpur]] on the edge of [[Lapaliiya]] in [[southwest Faerûn]] in the 13{{th}} and early 14{{th}} centuries [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/272/The New Adventures of Volo: Quotations of the Realms|97}}
{{quote|Rest you, good lady. Your labors have been hard this day, and the gods shall not soon forget what you accomplished. A war begun, a throne overthrown, a temple plundered, a city in flames, and hundreds dead. Hmmm… after this, I hope you don't find the morrow empty and boring.|Jeremmer Hardree to the usurper Queen [[Maerildarraine]] on the night of [[Bloodsword]], [[1306 DR]].}}
